rows.label: qst711502_msg0001
rows.name: Took care of the Espina Feris, did you?

rows.label: qst711502_msg0003
rows.name:
I'll be able to get on
with my important research
into ether miasmas now!

rows.label: qst711502_msg0004
rows.name:
My hypothesis is that the miasma is an
exhaust gas emitted by Divine Beasts. A
Divine Beast's fart, I suppose you'd call it.

rows.label: qst711502_msg0005
rows.name:
I mean, it's not such a wacky idea.
Any fool knows that a Divine Beast's
main source of energy is ether.

rows.label: qst711502_msg0006
rows.name:
I've an idea that if we fix the ether
flows, we might improve the health of
Divine Beasts and disperse the miasmas.

rows.label: qst711502_msg0007
rows.name:
Of course, I've a quite a bit of work
to do before I prove it conclusively.
You can't get by on guesses in science!

rows.label: qst711502_msg0009
rows.name:
You mean... One of you lot
knows how to control ether
flows? Well I never!

rows.label: qst711502_msg0010
rows.name:
You could probably shut off an
ether miasma no problem, right?

rows.label: qst711502_msg0011
rows.name: No way! I don't believe it!

rows.label: qst711502_msg0012
rows.name:
Looks like my hypothesis
is correct after all!

rows.label: qst711502_msg0013
rows.name:
I'll have quite a bit of
work to do to gather up all
the evidence now, mind.

rows.label: qst711502_msg0014
rows.name:
Well, thank you so much, you
lot. You've done a lot to advance
the cause of the science!

rows.label: qst711502_msg0101
rows.name:
Fierce beasts, those Espina Feris.
Let me know when you've sorted it.

rows.label: qst711502_msg0102
rows.name:
I can get on with my research
into ether miasmas when you've
done that, you see.

rows.label: qst711502_msg0103
rows.name:
Thanks for handling it. I'm
hopeless with monsters.
